title: How To: Replace The Water Filter In Your Bosch Refrigerator Using Filter BORPLFTR10
description:
Learn how to replace your water filter using the BORPLFTR10 filter from Bosch!

Bosch UltraClarity Refrigerator Water Filter - BORPLFTR10 http://www.abt.com/product/62859/Bosch-BORPLFTR10.html

Features:
• For Models: B22CS... B26FT... B30BB... B36BT... B36ET... B36IT... KAD62…
• Reduces chlorine taste and odors while improving the quality of water for drinking and cooking
• Water filters should be changed every 6 months or when the appliance indicates it needs to be changed
• This item replaces part number 00641425
• This item also has a model number of RA450010 BORPLFTR10 and BORPLFTR10(00)
